posts.title: How To Be A Man Book
posts.content: Learn the ins and outs of how to be a proper gentleman with guidance from the How To Be A Man book. Just because you’re born with a y-chromosome and a floppy meatstick doesn’t make you a real man – but after reading this informative book, you will be!

posts.title: Beer Stacker Base
posts.content: Get organized with your drinking addiction. The grip on this unobtrusive piece of genius allows you to stack up bottled and canned beer in a neat little pyramid so that you don’t have cans falling on your head when you go in to get a piece of cheese.

posts.title: Light Up Skateboard
posts.content: Tear up the streets long after the sun goes down by riding atop this light up skateboard. The eye-catching 7-ply hard rock maple deck comes embedded with LEDs all along the bottom that you can easily turn on and off to light up your path.

posts.title: Leaf Scooper Claws
posts.content: These ginormous leaf scooper claws turn the tedious task of raking your yard into a breeze. They’re big enough to fit over your work gloves and allow you to go straight from picking up the leaves to dumping them into the trash bin in one fluid motion.

posts.title: Bombs Away Shot Glasses
posts.content: Bombard your liver with alcohol delivered from these bombs away shot glasses. These unique shot glasses feature an interior mold that will fill up in the shape of a classic bomb, making them ideal for drinking Jagerbombs, Irish car bombs, or even cherry bombs.

posts.title: 2-In-1 Switch Drill & Driver
posts.content: Finish your projects at a quicker pace by streamlining your work process using this 2-in-1 switch drill and driver. It features a lightweight design that makes it easy to control and can seamlessly switch between drilling and driving modes for maximum convenience.

posts.title: Squirrel Head Feeder
posts.content: Provide some laughs for you and your friends while you feed the furry creatures in your tree some delicious grub using the squirrel head feeder. This novelty feeder hangs in the yard and creates the hilarious illusion the squirrel has an over-sized head when he goes to eat.

posts.title: Finger Twister Game
posts.content: Your favorite game of physical skill and flexibility is now more portable than with this Finger Twister mini board game. It’s fun, small enough to fit on any desktop, and provides a great way of improving overall finger dexterity while you play with friends.

posts.title: Inflatable Clamshell Float
posts.content: Feel like a mermaid soaking up the rays in a secluded cove by laying out on this inflatable clamshell float. The float features a beautiful matte finish, measures 3’10” x 4’2″ x 1’8″, and comes with an extra large double valve for quick inflation and deflation.

posts.title: Scratch And Sniff Whiskey Book
posts.content: Impress friends with your impressive bar banter by turning yourself into a whiskey connoisseur with this Scratch And Sniff Whiskey book. It simplifies the complex world of whiskey into three simple categories so that anyone can become an expert in no time at all.

posts.title: Fully Adjustable Pool Recliner Float
posts.content: Enjoy an array of comfortable seating positions when you’re relaxing on the fully adjustable pool recliner float. The steel frame comes wrapped in double thick layers of vinyl coated foam and can be adjusted just like a lawn chair so you’re always comfortable.

posts.title: Electric Callus Remover And Shaver
posts.content: Keep your feet feeling baby smooth using this electric callus remover and shaver. It features a compact design that fits comfortably in your hand and comes with a head that spins more than 40 times per second for better exfoliation.
